rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {2224, 3806, 3831, 4436, B2007}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ACC2131, ACF2391, ACG2020, ACW2020, AFC2131, AFF2391, AFG2020, AFW2020}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACB1002, ACB1100, ACC1030, ACF1121, ACG1002, ACW1002, AFC1030, AFF1121, AFG1002, AFW1002} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: Introduction to management accounting. Topics include: basic terms and concepts, classification and behaviour of costs, recording product cost transactions for manufacturing firms, joint and by-product spoilage and waste, apportioning joint costs for multiple products, activity-based costing and information for management decisions.
